procedures.checklist_entry: Verify GoPro (battery, time, settings), then start recording and announce operation details.
procedures.procedure_description: Configure the camera to 1080p at 25 fps with a visible timestamp. Clearly state the operation number, flight number, date, time, crew roles, and mission objective.
Assess weather (no high winds, good visibility, no incoming rain, no low clouds.). Review no-fly zones, NOTAMs (https://metar-taf.com/notams/HKNA), and topographic hazards.
Use a compass or suitable tool to find north.

procedures.checklist_entry: Power on the Controller, and confirm controller mode
procedures.procedure_description: Power on the controller, and confirm the controller mode (e.g., Mode 1 or 2).

procedures.checklist_entry: Conduct UAS inspection, and insert a new Battery & SD card
procedures.procedure_description: Check for cracks, damage, or loose components. Ensure propellers rotate smoothly with no visible defects.

procedures.checklist_entry: Power on the UAS, check failsafes, errors, GPS fix, and RSSI strength:
procedures.procedure_description: Set failsafes: RTH (Return to Home), RTH altitude, max distance, max altitude. Check for errors (e.g. calibration), GPS fix (at least 6 satellites) and strong RSSI.
Ensure UAS strobes are switched on.

procedures.checklist_entry: Position the landing mat away from the pilot, and ensure team is behind the pilot
procedures.procedure_description: Place the landing pad at a safe distance (at least 5 meters) to minimise risk and ensure clear takeoffs and landings.

procedures.checklist_entry: Position the landing mat away from the pilot
procedures.procedure_description: Place the landing pad at a safe distance to minimize risk and ensure clear takeoffs and landings.
If multiple UAS are operating, coordinate vertical separation and set maximum altitude to maintain safe distances.

procedures.checklist_entry: Confirm mission plan, check crew roles and safety vests
procedures.procedure_description: Discuss the flight path, waypoints, and areas of interest with the team, confirm crew is wearing safety vests and understands roles.

procedures.checklist_entry: Confirm mission plan, check crew roles
procedures.procedure_description: Discuss the flight path, waypoints, and areas of interest with the team, confirm crew understands roles.
Ensure each evacuation car seat is allocated and free of clutter in case of an emergency.
Ensure no team member is suffering from Illness, Medication, Stress, Alcohol, Fatigue, or Emotion (IMSAFE).
Make certain the pilot and assistant pilot are fully confident with contingency actions and emergency protocols.
Team agrees to proceed: no ground risks (wildlife, uninvolved people), no air risks (drones, aircraft), and team is IMSAFE.
Ensure no objections from nearby pilots before take-off.

procedures.checklist_entry: Announce 'TAKING-OFF', then take off and move away from pilot
procedures.procedure_description: Maintain a 1:1 height-distance ratio during take-off.

procedures.checklist_entry: Verify flight performance away from pilot
procedures.procedure_description: Ensure UAS is at a safe distance. Fly forward, backward, left, right, and verify expected behavior.
